main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted by a civilian pilot near Effingham, Illinois, in 1950.
interesting points: The object grew in size and brightness, reaching an estimated 3 miles in diameter., The civilian pilot reported observing a set of three lights on a collision course with his aircraft., The lights were described as a dull red and unlike typical aircraft position lights., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes before the lights disappeared., Reliable sources indicate that this incident has been reviewed, though no confirmation details were obtained.
sighted object: a dull red triangular object with three lights
witness description: a civilian pilot and his passenger
